item.tinkersextraweapons.pike.descriptio:
The Pike is a long polearm weapon with extended reach. Its length keeps enemies at a distance.
Hold the line!
item.tinkersextraweapons.warhammer.descr:
The Warhammer is a heavy blunt weapon. Delivers crushing blows that knock back enemies and shake the ground.
Right Click: Quake attack
item.tinkersextraweapons.lance.descripti:
The Lance is a mounted combat weapon. Deals devastating damage while riding.
Charge!
item.tinkersextraweapons.greatsword.desc: The Greatsword is a massive two-handed blade. Slow but powerful sweeping attacks cleave through multiple foes.
item.tinkersextraweapons.sickle.descript: The Sickle is a swift farming tool turned weapon. Effective at harvesting plants and striking quickly.
item.tinkersextraweapons.boarding_axe.de:
The Boarding Axe is a versatile weapon for close combat. Its hook can catch and weaken enemy weapons.
Also effective on wood!
item.tinkersextraweapons.quarterstaff.de: The Quarterstaff is a balanced staff weapon. Quick strikes and sweeping attacks with modest reach.
item.tinkersextraweapons.parrying_dagger:
The Parrying Dagger is a defensive sidearm. Fast attacks and provides armor when held.
Right Click: Block incoming attacks
modifier.tinkersextraweapons.cavalry.des: Deals double damage while riding a mount.
modifier.tinkersextraweapons.quake.descr: Right-click to release a shockwave that damages and knocks back nearby enemies.
modifier.tinkersextraweapons.swordbreake: Applies Weakness to targets for 2 seconds on hit.
